description:
The heuristic excitation-preserving wave function ansatz.

    The ``ExcitationPreserving`` circuit preserves the ratio of :math:`|00\rangle`,
    :math:`|01\rangle + |10\rangle` and :math:`|11\rangle` states. To this end, this circuit
    uses two-qubit interactions of the form

    .. math::

        \newcommand{\rotationangle}{\theta/2}

        \begin{pmatrix}
        1 & 0 & 0 & 0 \\
        0 & \cos\left(\rotationangle\right) & -i\sin\left(\rotationangle\right) & 0 \\
        0 & -i\sin\le
specification:
Circuit: ExcitationPreserving_2
Qubits: 2
Classical bits: 0
Depth: 1
Size: 1

Expected Behavior:
- Circuit should compile to XMLProgrammer AST without errors
- AST should be valid according to SimulatorValidator
- Simulator should execute without runtime errors
- Output state should be consistent with circuit semantics
